title: These boot enchant bugs could of been avoided if...
body: you left Mundo's Shose Shop be. He's out for revenge now.

replies.body: I did not expect the curse of Mundo.
Mundo's Shose Shop is still just as viable as always. The only problem is that now you need to upgrade your boots of speed into a tier 2 form before you can buy more boots of speed.
Mundo's Shose Shop has risen to the next level.
